ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: author_
ivardefs.desc: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

ivardefs.name: bodySite_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the sites on the subject's body where the procedure should be performed (I.e. the target sites).

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the activity definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the activity definition.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the activity definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the activity de

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the activity definition from a consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: doNotPerform
ivardefs.desc: Set this to true if the definition is to indicate that a particular activity should NOT be performed. If true, this element should be interpreted to reinforce a negative coding. For example NPO as a code with a doNotPerform of true would still indicate to

ivardefs.name: dosage_
ivardefs.desc: Provides detailed dosage instructions in the same way that they are described for MedicationRequest resources.

ivardefs.name: dynamicValue_
ivardefs.desc: Dynamic values that will be evaluated to produce values for elements of the resulting resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a dynamic value would be used to specify an expression that calculat

ivardefs.name: editor_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the activity definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

ivardefs.name: endorser_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

ivardefs.name: experimental
ivardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this activity definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this activity definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the activity and where the request should fit into the workflow chain.

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the activity definition is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: kind
ivardefs.desc: A description of the kind of resource the activity definition is representing. For example, a MedicationRequest, a ServiceRequest, or a CommunicationRequest. Typically, but not always, this is a Request resource.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: library_
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the activity definition.

ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the activity definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

ivardefs.name: observationRequirement_
ivardefs.desc: Defines observation requirements for the action to be performed, such as body weight or surface area.

ivardefs.name: observationResultRequirement_
ivardefs.desc: Defines the observations that are expected to be produced by the action.

ivardefs.name: participant_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the activity  should be addressed with respect to other requests.

ivardefs.name: profile
ivardefs.desc: A profile to which the target of the activity definition is expected to conform.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the activity definition.

ivardefs.name: purpose
ivardefs.desc: Explanation of why this activity definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed at once (per dose, per meal, etc.).

ivardefs.name: relatedArtifact_
ivardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

ivardefs.name: reviewer_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

ivardefs.name: specimenRequirement_
ivardefs.desc: Defines specimen requirements for the action to be performed, such as required specimens for a lab test.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of this activity definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

ivardefs.name: subtitle
ivardefs.desc: An explanatory or alternate title for the activity definition giving additional information about its content.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the activity definition.

ivardefs.name: topic_
ivardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the activity. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the activity that can be useful for filtering and searching.

ivardefs.name: transform
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at whic

ivardefs.name: usage
ivardefs.desc: A detailed description of how the activity definition is used from a clinical perspective.

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the activity definition author and is not expected to be globally un

properties.desc: This resource allows for the definition of some activity to be performed, independent of a particular patient, practitioner, or other performance context.
